api_delegation.api_delegations: Delegated accesses to application programming interface - API
api_delegation.api_delegations_received: Received accesses to application programming interface - API
api_delegation.you_have_delegated_accesses: You have earlier delegated these accesses:
api_delegation.api_panel_content: API is an interface used to exchange data between two different systems or apps. When the API of two systems is connected, it opens up for a streamlined sharing of data and automated processes.
api_delegation.api_overview_text: Here you'll find an overview over the API-accesses your organisation has delegated to other organisations
api_delegation.api_received_overview_text: Here you'll find an overview over the API-accesses your organisation has been granted by other organisations
api_delegation.new_org_accordion_content_text: Select which users will have access by clicking the plus sign. You can also add new.
api_delegation.businesses_going_to_get_access: Businesses that will receive the right:
api_delegation.confirmation_page_content_top_text: You wish to give access to the following APIs
api_delegation.confirmation_page_content_second_text: The API-accesses will be given to:
api_delegation.confirmation_page_content_bottom_text: The accesses will be given and is valid until it actively is deleted. The receiver will be notified.
api_delegation.new_api_content_text2: Select which APIs you want to grant access to by clicking the plus sign. You can also search for APIs by name and filter by provider.
api_delegation.no_chosen_orgs: You have no selected organizations to provide API access to. Please click the previous button at the bottom right.
api_delegation.data_retrieval_failed: Data retrieval failed, try refreshing the page.
api_delegation.orgs_not_chosen_subtitle: Couldn't retrieve chosen organisations. Please go to previous page to choose organisations by clicking previous button on the bottom to the right.
api_delegation.delegations_not_chosen: Your choices were not registered. Please restart the delegation process.
